title: This new health bar is sucks

replies.body: The grammar and spelling in this post gave me cancer.
Windows 10 health bar for flatness of improved FPS, never lose for battery again.

I also didn't like it at first, but I think that's because we're all used to the old health bar. I think you should just give it a little more time. It'll probably grow on you.

Could you imagine if they changed our cursor though? >.<
